Install and mark batterboards. 11. Install reinforcing bar/dowel. 12. Lay brick/block. 13. Check for plumbness/ squareness. 14. Construct/cast-in place concrete structures. 15. Check all brick/block and concrete works for quality. 16. Clean work site and maintain
